## CustomerInfo interface

Type containing all information regarding the customer.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare interface CustomerInfo 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [activeSubscriptions](./purchases-js.customerinfo.activesubscriptions.md) | <code>readonly</code> | Set&lt;string&gt; | Set of active subscription product identifiers. |
|  [allExpirationDatesByProduct](./purchases-js.customerinfo.allexpirationdatesbyproduct.md) | <code>readonly</code> | { \[productIdentifier: string\]: Date \| null; } | Map of productIds to expiration dates. |
|  [allPurchaseDatesByProduct](./purchases-js.customerinfo.allpurchasedatesbyproduct.md) | <code>readonly</code> | { \[productIdentifier: string\]: Date; } | Map of productIds to purchase dates. |
|  [entitlements](./purchases-js.customerinfo.entitlements.md) | <code>readonly</code> | [EntitlementInfos](./purchases-js.entitlementinfos.md) | Entitlements attached to this customer info. |
|  [firstSeenDate](./purchases-js.customerinfo.firstseendate.md) | <code>readonly</code> | Date | The date this user was first seen in RevenueCat. |
|  [managementURL](./purchases-js.customerinfo.managementurl.md) | <code>readonly</code> | string \| null | URL to manage the active subscription of the user. If this user has an active RC Billing subscription, a link to the management page. If this user has an active iOS subscription, this will point to the App Store. If the user has an active Play Store subscription it will point there. If there are no active subscriptions it will be null. |
|  [originalAppUserId](./purchases-js.customerinfo.originalappuserid.md) | <code>readonly</code> | string | The original App User Id recorded for this user. |
|  [originalPurchaseDate](./purchases-js.customerinfo.originalpurchasedate.md) | <code>readonly</code> | Date \| null | The purchase date for the version of the application when the user bought the app. Use this for grandfathering users when migrating to subscriptions. This can be null. |
|  [requestDate](./purchases-js.customerinfo.requestdate.md) | <code>readonly</code> | Date | Date when this info was requested. |
